Package org.apache.edgent.topology

Functional api to build a streaming topology.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Topology
    A declaration of a topology of streaming data.
    TopologyElement
    An element of a Topology.
    TopologyProvider
    Provider (factory) for creating topologies.
    TSink<T>
    Termination point (sink) for a stream.
    TStream<T>
    A TStream is a declaration of a continuous sequence of tuples.
    TWindow<T,K>
    Partitioned window of tuples.

Package org.apache.edgent.topology Description

Functional api to build a streaming topology.

Bringing data into Edgent

Data, for example device events, to be be processed and analyzed by Edgent is brought on source streams which are implemented through functions.
For details on how to create source streams see Edgent Source Streams.
